about_the_game:
The story takes place in ancient China, a time of plague, incompetence of the imperial court, corruption of the officials, and the lack of livelihood of the people. The warrior Diao Yidart, who is not used to the oppression of the people by the imperial court, lives in seclusion with his wife in Qingdeng Peak. However, when he learns that his friend, Li Wuyi, has been arrested and imprisoned, Diao Yidart decides to go out to rescue him.......
This is a role-playing game, the game is mainly designed in cartoon style, players can fight with enemies freely. The game is based on the story of the characters, and players can trigger the plot of the next scene by defeating the level lords. In the game, you can see the cute protagonist "Diao Yi Dart" and a series of stories that happen when he saves the people. The game is played from a classic 2D perspective and you can run, jump, use swords and shuriken to attack your enemies, and of course our protagonist can also use special attacks to hit them hard. You only need to use 7 buttons to control the whole game, which reduces the difficulty of operation and allows players of lower ages to get started quickly. If you like the Super Mario style, you should try this game. If you are over 8 years old and are looking for a game to play, you should give this game a try.

The story takes place in ancient China, a time of plague, incompetence of the imperial court, corruption of the officials, and the lack of livelihood of the people. The warrior Diao Yidart, who is not used to the oppression of the people by the imperial court, lives in seclusion with his wife in Qingdeng Peak. However, when he learns that his friend, Li Wuyi, has been arrested and imprisoned, Diao Yidart decides to go out to rescue him.......
This is a role-playing game, the game is mainly designed in cartoon style, players can fight with enemies freely. The game is based on the story of the characters, and players can trigger the plot of the next scene by defeating the level lords. In the game, you can see the cute protagonist "Diao Yi Dart" and a series of stories that happen when he saves the people. The game is played from a classic 2D perspective and you can run, jump, use swords and shuriken to attack your enemies, and of course our protagonist can also use special attacks to hit them hard. You only need to use 7 buttons to control the whole game, which reduces the difficulty of operation and allows players of lower ages to get started quickly. If you like the Super Mario style, you should try this game. If you are over 8 years old and are looking for a game to play, you should give this game a try.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 (or newer) Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel/Apple Silicon 2+ Cores (1.7GHz and above)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated graphics
  • Storage: 1600 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 (or newer) Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel/Apple Silicon 2+ Cores (1.7GHz and above)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: discrete graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Chinese Pope Door

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Core i3 or higher recommended
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1650 and above
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Core i5 or higher recommended
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1660 and above
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This is a role-playing game where the player can fight freely with the enemies. You can run and jump freely, use sword and dart to attack the enemies, and special attack to give the enemies a heavy blow. If you like Super Mario's style of operation, you must try this game.
